channel.title: cv on Ryan Moodie
channel.description: Recent content in cv on Ryan Moodie

item.title: Postdoc applications
item.description: I have put together: Cover letter (source) Curriculum vitae (source) List of publications (this is included in the CV, but some applications ask for it separately) Research statement (source) for applying for postdoctoral research associate/assistant/award (PDRA) positions.

item.title: CV update
item.description: When applying to the SAGEX School in Mathematica and Maple, I had to provide a CV, which was good motivation to update my CV (source) and current research statement (source).

item.title: PhD applications
item.description: I’m applying for PhDs just now. Have a look at my CV or statement of purpose if you like.
